name: Fish 'N' Chips
description:
A fisherman trapped in dangerous waves is flipped over into the deep dark ocean. When he wakes up, he must find his cat “Chips”. Take up the challenge, swing through the levels, and save your friend! But be aware, a single fall can lead a long way back!



Fish 'N' Chips is a quick adventure game. The controls are very simple. Only jump and swing! However, with many layers to master, every death becomes a lesson. The soulsborne of grappling hook games (it's not actually that hard).

You can do this! Your friend is waiting for you!
